'''Zaki''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the {{Quest|The Missing Village Keepers}}.

==Profile==
Zaki eavesdrops on the Traveler, deceives and lures the Traveler into a trap, and ambushes the Traveler. However, the Traveler and Dehya beat up Zaki and his acquaintances.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Missing Village Keepers}}</ref>
